description: Reflection and archiving of project results and experiences

Identify successes and challenges in the project
Analyze the effectiveness of the different modes (VAN, PLAN, CREATE, IMPLEMENTATION)

Identify potential improvements for future projects
Archive all relevant project results and documents
Create a project summary for future reference
Use the MongoDB integration to store reflection and archiving results
